pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā upaṭṭhākakulaṃ thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.3: “sace mayaṃ, ayye, sakkoma, bhikkhunisaṃghassa cīvaraṃ dassāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo cīvaraṃ bhājetukāmā sannipatiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.9: Thullanandā bhikkhunī yena taṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te manusse etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.11: “Na mayaṃ, ayye, sakkoma bhikkhunisaṃghassa cīvaraṃ dātun”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.13: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.14: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.15: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.18: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.20: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.21: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.6: “sace mayaṃ sakkoma, dassāma karissāmā”ti vācā bhinnā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.8: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañca māsā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.10: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimaṃ divasaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.11: Atthate kathine kathinuddhāradivasaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.1: Dubbalacīvare dubbalacīvarasaññā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.2: Dubbalacīvare vematikā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
